verses.verse: And it came to pass <WH4428>, when all the kings which were on this side <WH5676> Jordan <WH3383>, in the hills <WH2022>, and in the valleys <WH8219>, and in all the coasts <WH2348> of the great <WH1419> sea <WH3220> over against <WH4136> Lebanon <WH3844>, the Hittite <WH2850>, and the Amorite <WH567>, the Canaanite <WH3669>, the Perizzite <WH6522>, the Hivite <WH2340>, and the Jebusite <WH2983>, heard there <WH8085>;
That they gathered <WH6908> themselves together <WH3162>, to fight <WH3898> with Joshua <WH3091> and with Israel <WH3478>, with one <WH259> accord <WH6310>.
And when the inhabitants <WH3427> of Gibeon <WH1391> heard <WH8085> what Joshua <WH3091> had done <WH6213> unto Jericho <WH3405> and to Ai <WH5857>,

They did work <WH6213> trickery <WH6195>, and went <WH3212> and made as if they had been ambassadors <WH6737>, and took <WH3947> old <WH1087> sacks <WH8242> upon their donkeys <WH2543>, and wine <WH3196> bottles <WH4997>, old <WH1087>, and tore <WH1234>, and bound up <WH6887>;

And old <WH1087> shoes <WH5275> and patched <WH2921> upon their feet <WH7272>, and old <WH1087> garments <WH8008> upon them <WH3899>; and all the bread of their provision <WH6718> was dry <WH3001> and moldy <WH5350>.

And they went <WH3212> to Joshua <WH3091> unto the camp <WH4264> at Gilgal <WH1537>, and said <WH559> unto him <WH376>, and to the men of Israel <WH3478>, We be come <WH935> from a far <WH7350> country <WH776>: now therefore make <WH3772> you a covenant with us <WH1285>.
And the men <WH376> of Israel <WH3478> said <WH559> unto the Hivites <WH2340>, Perhaps <WH194> you live <WH3427> among <WH7130> us <WH3772>; and how shall we make a covenant with you <WH1285>?
And they said <WH559> unto Joshua <WH3091>, We are your servants <WH5650>. And Joshua <WH3091> said <WH559> unto them <WH370>, Who are you and from from where come you <WH935>

And they said <WH559> unto him <WH3966>, From a very far <WH7350> country <WH776> your servants <WH5650> are come <WH935> because of the name <WH8034> of the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430>: for we have heard <WH8085> the fame <WH8089> of him <WH6213>, and all that he did in Egypt <WH4714>,

And all that he did <WH6213> to the two <WH8147> kings <WH4428> of the Amorites <WH567>, that were beyond <WH5676> Jordan <WH3383>, to Sihon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of Heshbon <WH2809>, and to Og <WH5747> king <WH4428> of Bashan <WH1316>, which was at Ashtaroth <WH6252>.

Why our elders <WH2205> and all the inhabitants <WH3427> of our country <WH776> spoke <WH559> to us <WH559>, saying, Take <WH3947> food <WH6720> with you <WH3027> for the journey <WH1870>, and go <WH3212> to meet <WH7125> them <WH559>, and say unto them <WH5650>, We are your servants: therefore now make <WH3772> you a covenant with us <WH1285>.

This our bread <WH3899> we took hot <WH2525> for our provision <WH6679> out of our houses <WH1004> on the day <WH3117> we came forth <WH3318> to go <WH3212> unto you <WH3001>; but now, behold, it is dry, and it is moldy <WH5350>:

And these bottles <WH4997> of wine <WH3196>, which we filled <WH4390>, were new <WH2319>; and <WH1234>, behold, they are torn: and these our garments <WH8008> and our shoes <WH5275> are become old <WH1086> by reason of the very <WH3966> long <WH7230> journey <WH1870>.
And the men <WH582> took <WH3947> of their food <WH6718>, and asked <WH7592> not counsel at the mouth <WH6310> of the Lord <WH3068>.

And Joshua <WH3091> made <WH6213> peace <WH7965> with them <WH3772>, and made a covenant <WH1285> with them <WH2421>, to let them live: and the princes <WH5387> of the congregation <WH5712> swore unto them <WH7650>.

And it came to pass at the end <WH7097> of three <WH7969> days <WH3117> after <WH310> they had made <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> with them <WH8085>, that they heard that they were their neighbours <WH7138>, and that they lived <WH3427> among them <WH7130>.

And the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> journeyed <WH5265>, and came <WH935> unto their cities <WH5892> on the third <WH7992> day <WH3117>. Now their cities <WH5892> were Gibeon <WH1391>, and Chephirah <WH3716>, and Beeroth <WH881>, and Kirjath <WH7157>â€“jearim.

And the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> struck <WH5221> them not <WH5387>, because the princes of the congregation <WH5712> had sworn <WH7650> unto them by the Lord <WH3068> God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>. And all the congregation <WH5712> murmured <WH3885> against the princes <WH5387>.

But all the princes <WH5387> said <WH559> unto all the congregation <WH5712>, We have sworn <WH7650> unto them by the Lord <WH3068> God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>: now therefore we may <WH3201> not touch them <WH5060>.
This we will do <WH6213> to them <WH2421>; we will even let them live, lest wrath <WH7110> be upon us <WH7621>, because of the oath which we swore unto them <WH7650>.

And the princes <WH5387> said <WH559> unto them <WH2421>, Let them live; but let them be hewers <WH2404> of wood <WH6086> and drawers <WH7579> of water <WH4325> unto all the congregation <WH5712>; as the princes <WH5387> had promised them <WH1696>.

And Joshua <WH3091> called <WH7121> for them <WH1696>, and he spoke unto them <WH559>, saying, Why have you deceived <WH7411> us <WH559>, saying, We are very <WH3966> far <WH7350> from you <WH3427>; when you live among us <WH7130>?

Now therefore you are cursed <WH779>, and there shall none of you be freed <WH3772> from being bondmen <WH5650>, and hewers <WH2404> of wood <WH6086> and drawers <WH7579> of water <WH4325> for the house <WH1004> of my God <WH430>.

And they answered <WH6030> Joshua <WH3091>, and said <WH559>, Because it was certainly <WH5046> told <WH5046> your servants <WH5650>, how that the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> commanded <WH6680> his servant <WH5650> Moses <WH4872> to give <WH5414> you all the land <WH776>, and to destroy <WH8045> all the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land <WH776> from before <WH6440> you <WH3966>, therefore we were very afraid <WH3372> for our lives <WH5315> because <WH6440> of you <WH6213>, and have done this thing <WH1697>.
And now <WH2009>, behold, we are in your hand <WH3027>: as it seems <WH5869> good <WH2896> and right <WH3477> unto you to do <WH6213> unto us <WH6213>, do.
And so did <WH6213> he unto them <WH5337>, and delivered them out of the hand <WH3027> of the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, that they killed them not <WH2026>.

And Joshua <WH3091> made <WH5414> them that day <WH3117> hewers <WH2404> of wood <WH6086> and drawers <WH7579> of water <WH4325> for the congregation <WH5712>, and for the altar <WH4196> of the Lord <WH3068>, even unto this day <WH3117>, in the place <WH4725> which he should choose <WH977>.
